```{r libraries, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
#Load Tidyverse
library(tidyverse)

#load dplyr
library(dplyr)

#load ggplot2
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r, results = "hide"}
(noaa_df <- read.csv("NOAA-Final-DF.csv"))
```

```{r}
summary(noaa_df)
```

```{r}
#Build scatterplot with ggplot
ggplot(noaa_df, aes(x=year,y=TAVG))+
  geom_point()
```
```{r, results = "hide"}
(noaa_df <- noaa_df %>% replace(is.na(.),0))
```


```{r}
cor(noaa_df %>% select(-c("station")))
```
